attributes.action: Help me get my Fiance home and gain his British Citizenship now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: As explained in our terms and conditions (http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms) we cannot accept petitions on individual cases such as this, as they are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
